verbs.description: David Patrikarakos , [ARG0: the man] [R-ARG0: who] [ARGM-ADV: literally] [V: wrote] [ARG1: the book about the Iranian nuclear program] , has a long Twitter thread with his reaction to Trump ’s decision to violate the JCPOA .
